## Why Data Analytics? The Career That's Taking Over

Data analytics is one of the **fastest-growing careers** in 2025, with over **2.7 million job openings** globally and an average salary of $75,000-$120,000. Companies are desperate for people who can turn data into decisions.

**The best part?** You don't need a degree in mathematics or computer science to break in!

## Your 100-Day Transformation Plan

### **Days 1-20: Foundation Building** ðŸ“š

#### Week 1-2: Excel Mastery
- **Learn:** Data cleaning, pivot tables, VLOOKUP, conditional formatting
- **FREE Resources:**
  - [Microsoft Excel Fundamentals](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/excel) - Official tutorials
  - [ExcelJet: 500+ Free Excel Tips](https://exceljet.net/) 
  - [Chandoo.org Excel School](https://chandoo.org/wp/excel-school/) - Comprehensive free course
  - [Coursera: Excel Skills for Business](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/excel) - Free to audit

#### Week 3-4: SQL Basics
- **Learn:** SELECT, WHERE, JOIN, GROUP BY, aggregate functions
- **FREE Resources:**
  - [SQLBolt](https://sqlbolt.com/) - Interactive SQL lessons
  - [W3Schools SQL Tutorial](https://www.w3schools.com/sql/)
  - [Mode Analytics SQL Tutorial](https://mode.com/sql-tutorial/)
  - [Khan Academy: Intro to SQL](https://www.khanacademy.org/computing/computer-programming/sql)
  - [HackerRank SQL Practice](https://www.hackerrank.com/domains/sql)

**ðŸ’¡ Mini Project:** Analyze a sales dataset in Excel, then import it to SQLite and practice queries.

#### Week 5-7: Python for Data Analysis
- **Learn:** Pandas, NumPy, data cleaning, exploratory data analysis

#### Week 8-10: Statistics Fundamentals

  - [Seeing Theory](https://seeing-theory.brown.edu/) - Visual statistics
  - [OpenIntro Statistics (Free Textbook)](https://www.openintro.org/book/os/)

## Essential Free Datasets for Practice

1. **[Kaggle Datasets](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets)** - Thousands of real-world datasets
2. **[UCI Machine Learning Repository](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/index.php)** - Classic datasets
3. **[Data.gov](https://www.data.gov/)** - US government data
4. **[Google Dataset Search](https://datasetsearch.research.google.com/)** - Find any dataset
5. **[FiveThirtyEight Data](https://data.fivethirtyeight.com/)** - Fun, newsworthy datasets
6. **[World Bank Open Data](https://data.worldbank.org/)** - Global development data
7. **[Our World in Data](https://ourworldindata.org/)** - Research and data
8. **[TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday)** - Weekly data challenges

---

## Daily Study Schedule

**Weekdays (2-3 hours/day):**
- 1 hour: Learning (videos, reading, tutorials)
- 1-2 hours: Hands-on practice (coding, analysis)

**Weekends (4-5 hours/day):**
- Project work and portfolio building

**Total Time Investment:** 200-250 hours over 100 days

## Success Tips from Someone Who Made It ðŸŽ¯

1. **Consistency > Intensity:** 2 hours daily beats 14 hours on Sunday
2. **Project-First Learning:** Learn by building, not just watching
3. **Document Everything:** Write blog posts about what you learn
4. **Network Actively:** Comment, contribute, connect
5. **Don't Get Stuck:** If you're stuck for 30+ minutes, ask for help
6. **Apply Early:** Don't wait to be "ready" - apply at day 80
